entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13 except minus 18 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13 except minus 18 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
